user.title: HAKboard Setup
user.description:
HAKboard integrates your self-hosted [Kanboard](https://kanboard.org/) server (a free, open-source Kanban project management tool) into Home Assistant, enabling rich dashboard visualizations and workflow automation.

**Prerequisites:** Access to, and API credentials for, an existing Kanboard installation. API details are located at `Kanboard UI \ Settings \ API`

**⚠️ Instance Key (Important):** The Instance Key is a short, mandatory, unique identifier (e.g. `hl`). It is the namespace for all HAKboard entity IDs, ensuring uniqueness and preventing collisions.

**Example:** setting the Instance Key to `hl` to denote your `Homelab` instance will result in the following created entity IDs: `sensor.hakboard_hl_xxx`

**ℹ️ NOTE:** HAKboard is a community project and is not affiliated with Kanboard.

data_description.instance_key: Enter a short, unique Instance Key.
data_description.instance_name: Enter a friendly name for your Instance. This can be safely changed at any time.
data_description.api_endpoint: Copy/Paste the full API endpoint URL from Kanboard, including /jsonrpc.php
data_description.api_token: Copy/Paste the API Token from Kanboard.
data_description.project_filter: Specify which Project IDs to sync. Examples: `1`, `1,5,11`, `1-3`, `1-3,5,7-9`
data_description.poll_interval: How often HAKboard syncs Kanboard data with Home Assistant. Default 5m, min 5s.

error.interval_too_short: Polling interval must be at least 5 seconds.
